project_info.name: Al-Bayan Islamic Companion
project_info.description: A comprehensive, offline-first Islamic web application designed to be a daily spiritual companion. It integrates the Noble Quran, Audio Recitations, Prayer Times, and Azkar in a modern, user-friendly interface.

modes.description: Simulates a physical Quran book with realistic page flipping, adhering to the Madani 604-page standard.
Continuous vertical scroll for quick reading and verse searching.

audio_recitation.title: Audio & Tilawa
audio_recitation.offline_support: Ability to download specific Reciter audio for offline playback using IndexedDB.

prayer_times.title: Prayer & Qibla
features: Hijri & Gregorian Calendar with Monthly View

azkar_daily.title: Azkar & Dua
features: Digital Tasbeeh Counter with progress bars
Categorized Dua Library (Travel, Prayer, Anxiety, etc.)

media_stories.title: Islamic Media Library
features: Support for YouTube & Direct Video Sources

customization.title: Settings & UI
options: Font Family Selection (Amiri, Noto Naskh, Uthmani)

data_persistence.indexedDB: Offline storage for Quran text, Tafseer JSON, and Audio Blobs

how_it_works.initialization: On first load, the app requests geolocation permissions to fetch accurate prayer times. It then defaults to the 'Dashboard' view.
how_it_works.offline_strategy: The app follows an 'Offline-First' approach. Users can go to Settings > Downloads to fetch Quran text and Audio. Once downloaded, the app detects the lack of internet connection and serves data directly from IndexedDB.
how_it_works.navigation: A persistent bottom navigation bar allows quick switching between Home, Quran, Prayer, Azkar, Stories, and Settings.
how_it_works.state_sync: Reading progress (page number) and video watch history are automatically synced to LocalStorage, ensuring the user resumes exactly where they left off.
